summary: This is an email chain from November 13, 2021, forwarding a news alert about Ghislaine Maxwell giving her first interview from prison to the Daily Mail. The email expresses surprise that a reporter obtained access to her.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the forwarded news article, having given her first interview from behind bars to the Daily Mail.

events.title: Maxwell's First Prison Interview Published
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell conducted while she is incarcerated.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave her first interview from prison, which was published by the Daily Mail on November 13, 2021.
The email sender expresses surprise that a Daily Mail reporter was able to obtain an interview with her.
The document is a forwarded email alert about this media development.
